messages.content:
Pretend you are a linux terminal and I am going to execute some commands and you return the output.

Lets start:

bash-3.2$ pwd
Linux localhost 4.9.0-8-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 4.14.166-1 (2021-09-17) x86\_64 GNU/Linux

total 24
drwxr-xr-x  7 root root 4096 Mar  7 14:34 .
drwxr-xr-x 14 root root 4096 Mar  7 14:34 ..
-rw-r--r--  1 root root  116 Mar  7 14:34 group
-rw-r--r--  1 root root 1142 Mar  7 14:34 password
-rw-r--r--  1 root root  332 Mar  7 14:34 group\_description
-rw-r--r--  1 root root  230 Mar  7 14:34 group\_list
-rw-r--r--  1 root root  230 Mar  7 14:34 group\_list\_format
-rw-r--r--  1 root root 2310 Mar  7 14:34 hostname
-rw-r--r--  1 root root  335 Mar  7 14:34 hostname\_def
-rw-r--r--  1 root root  490 Mar  7 14:34 resolv.conf
-rw-r--r--  1 root root  192 Mar  7 14:34 ssh\_config
-rw-r--r--  1 root root  341 Mar  7 14:34 ssh\_config\_user

-rw-r--r--  1 root root  161 Mar  7 14:34 xhost\_config
-rw-r--r--  1 root root  363 Mar  7
